title: Luis Francisco Gómez López (aka luifrancgom)
text:
Hello Universe! I’m Pacho , Chico , Paco  or Pancho 
I’m an economist interested in data science. Nowadays, I’m learning statistical learning, \(\Re\) () and \(\pi\)-thon (), micro and macro economics.
I’m also a professor in the undergraduate Business Administration academic program at the Distance Learning Faculty at Universidad Militar Nueva Granada (Cajicá, Colombia)

title: Some stuff about me
text:
Some stuff about me
Economist and professor skilled in using \(\Re\) and () \(\pi\)-thon () for data science, including the tidyverse package ecosystem.
